newsitem.title: USA: PRESS DIGEST - Daily Variety - November 7.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Daily Variety - November 7.

text.p: The following stories appeared in Thursday's edition of Daily Variety:
HOLLYWOOD - New Regency Enterprises of Time Warner Inc announced it had bought a 12.5-percent stake in Puma AG worth more than $60 million.

NEW YORK - Time Warner's Cable of New York City won a battle against News Corp Ltd's Fox News Channel as a federal court ruled that the city violated Time Warner's First Amendment rights when it tried to force Fox onto one of the city's channels.
HOLLYWOOD - Lindsay Doran, former president of Mirage Enterprises, sealed a deal to become president of United Artists of MGM.
